snippet: The city has begun a judgmental ad campaign that aims to embarrass teenage girls who are not yet mothers by warning of the terrible consequences that can result from getting pregnant.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column notes that New York City has begun a judgmental ad campaign that aims to embarrass teenage girls who are not yet mothers by warning of the terrible consequences that can result from getting pregnant.
lead_paragraph: The city has begun a judgmental ad campaign that aims to embarrass teenage girls who are not yet mothers by warning of the terrible consequences that can result from getting pregnant.

headline.seo: In Fighting Teenage Pregnancy, Bloomberg Errs by Playing Shame Game
headline.main: In Fighting Teenage Pregnancy, the Folly of Shame and Blame
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg’s Shame-and-Blame Tactic on Teenage Pregnancy
